attributes.action: Stop child abusers being released on bail from custody and protected by Government.
attributes.additional_details:
We want to see the Law changed so that anyone who is arrested & charged with abuse & sexual offences is not granted bail. People that commit such horrific acts should not be put back onto our streets with the freedom to re-offend and get protection from the Government.
These people are sick individuals that need to be kept away from civilized society, and most Importantly our children.
